1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Get parameters of relmap operator.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Get
6  ( -- * Type
7    RopGet,
8
9    -- * Tree
10    getTrees,
11    getWith, getWithAb,
12    getTree, 
13
14    -- * Basic
15    getTag, getTags,
16    getSwitch, getMaybe, getOpt,
17    getWord,
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus         as K
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core             as C
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern   as P
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message as Msg
24
25
26-- ----------------------  Type
27
28-- | Type for getting something from relmap intermidiate data.
29type RopGet a c
30    = C.Intmed c    -- ^ Intermediate relmap
31    -> String       -- ^ Parameter name, e.g., @\"-term\"@
32    -> K.Ab a       -- ^ Parameter value
33
34
35-- ----------------------  Tree
36
37-- | Lookup relmap parameter.
38(?) :: C.Intmed c -> String -> Maybe [K.Tree]
39(?) med ('-' : name) = K.AttrNormal name `K.paraLookupSingle` getPara med
40(?) _ _ = K.bug "rop"
41
42-- | Get trees from relmap parameter.
43--   This is the most basic getter
44--   because relmap parameters are syntactically represented as tree list.
45getTrees :: RopGet [K.Tree] c
46getTrees med name =
47    case med ? name of
48      Just trees -> Right trees
49      Nothing    -> Msg.noAttr name
50
51-- | Get relmap parameter and convert using function.
52getWith :: ([K.Tree] -> b) -> RopGet b c
53getWith f med name = Right . f =<< getTrees med name
54
55-- | Get relmap parameter and convert using abortable function.
56getWithAb :: ([K.Tree] -> K.Ab b) -> RopGet b c
57getWithAb f med name =
58    do trees <- getTrees med name
59       Msg.abAttrTrees trees $ f trees
60
61-- | Get tree from relmap parameter.
62getTree :: RopGet K.Tree c
63getTree = getWith K.ttreeGroup
64
65
66-- ----------------------  Basic
67
68-- | Get relmap parameter.
69getPara :: C.Intmed c -> K.AttrPara
70getPara = C.lexAttr . C.medLexmap
71
72-- | Test usage tag.
73getTag :: C.Intmed c -> K.ParaTag -> Bool
74getTag med tag = tag `elem` getTags med
75
76-- | Get usage tags.
77getTags :: C.Intmed c -> [K.ParaTag]
78getTags = K.paraTags . getPara
79
80-- | Get @True@ when parameter is given, @False@ otherwise.
81getSwitch :: RopGet Bool c
82getSwitch med name =
83    case med ? name of
84      Nothing  -> Right False
85      Just []  -> Right True
86      Just _   -> Msg.unexpAttr $ "Just type only " ++ name
87
88-- | Get parameter whenever given or not.
89getMaybe :: RopGet a c -> RopGet (Maybe a) c
90getMaybe get med name =
91    case med ? name of
92      Nothing -> Right Nothing
93      Just _  -> Right . Just =<< get med name
94
95-- | Get optional parameter with default value.
96getOpt :: a            -- ^ Default value
97       -> RopGet a c   -- ^ Non-optional getter
98       -> RopGet a c   -- ^ Optional getter
99getOpt y get med name =
100    case med ? name of
101      Nothing -> Right y
102      Just _  -> get med name
103
104-- | Get word.
105--
106--   > consXxx :: RopCons c
107--   > consXxx med = do
108--   >   sign <- getWord med "-sign"
109--   >   ...
110--
111getWord :: RopGet String c
112getWord = getWithAb word where
113    word [P.LText _ s] = Right s
114    word _ = Msg.unexpAttr "Require one word"
